menu_items.name: Corona Virus
menu_items.description: Most common symptoms fever , dry cough , tiredness . Less common symptoms aches and pains , sore throat , diarrhoea , conjunctivitis , headache , loss of taste or smell , a rash on skin, or discolouration of fingers or toes . Serious symptoms difficulty breathing or shortness of breath , chest pain or pressure , loss of speech or movement
menu_items.precaution: Hand hygiene - wash hands after every 20 mins ,Use of personal protective equipment (e.g., gloves, gowns, masks) Safe injection practices , Safe handling of potentially contaminated equipment or surfaces in the patient environment, and Respiratory hygiene/cough etiquette.
menu_items.cause: Comes in contact of infected person

menu_items.name: Chicken Pox
menu_items.description: The most characteristic symptom is an itchy, blister-like rash on the skin. Skin blister, scab, ulcers, or red spots on whole body  fatigue, fever, or loss of appetite Also common headache, itching, sore throat, or swollen lymph nodes , excess heat is realised in the form of bumps.
menu_items.precaution: Stay away from infected person , maintain personal hygine and it can be prevented from vaccine
menu_items.cause: Caused due to direct contact with infected persons rashes or when that person cough or sneeze its droplets can be source of causing chicken pox.

menu_items.name: Malaria
menu_items.description: Chills, fever and sweating, usually occuring a few weeks after being bitten . Peaople may experience pain in abdomenal or musceles . Headache, mental confusion , fast heart rate are common.
menu_items.precaution: keep you surrounding clean . Make sure it doesn't have flies .
